name: The Storage room
description:
The Storage room, is all about surviving waves of robotic enemies in a storage room.

Story: You are a hard employee at some hotel and find yourself moving crates and boxes when you hear some sudden shooting and screaming, you drop the crate you where moving and a rifle falls out.

You scramble for some ammo found in the bottom of the crate and prepare yourself. What happens next is up to you...

Note: Sorry about the bad AI I did my best...

Controls:

Move - WASD + Mouse

Shoot - Mouse button

If you liked my game and want to help with the costs of making it into a full game with lots of new feature and more, donate a couple of cents or penny's.

Thanks :)
